title: Places To Sing
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Your hometown is so full of nature, Emma-san~. The goat in the video.... The hill Neve-chan was jumping on looked like something out of a movie! It must feel so great to sing there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, it does~. I used to always sing there for Neve and the others back in Switzerland.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ahaha, that sounds fun~! I would love to an overseas live with μ’s! Starting with your hometown’s hill!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu. I think Neve-chan, the others, and my family would be more than happy. If you can do an overseas live, what other place do you want to hold it in, Honoka-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm.... Where, huh? I think I want to hold it somewhere no one else has ever done before~. Let’s say.... The Amazons, for example!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>The Amazons?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>On a stage with a waterfall 100 meters over the jungle!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeeh!? C-, can people even get up there....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Also, the pyramids! I heard that the insides of a pyramid are like a maze. So something like a yellow stage at the end of that maze!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Going to μ’s overseas lives sounds like a lot of work.... But I’ll do my best to get there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
